requiredPlugins.title: Yoast SEO
requiredPlugins.description: Yoast SEO is a comprehensive search engine optimization plugin for WordPress, which offers various features to optimize your site for maximum visibility in search engines.

requiredPlugins.title: Jetpack
requiredPlugins.description: Jetpack offers a suite of design, security, and marketing tools for WordPress sites, including real-time backups and easy-to-use performance enhancements.

requiredPlugins.title: WooCommerce
requiredPlugins.description: WooCommerce is a customizable, open-source eCommerce platform built on WordPress, allowing users to set up online stores with ease.

recommendedPlugins.title: Creative Mail
recommendedPlugins.description: Creative Mail is an email marketing plugin designed to seamlessly integrate with WordPress, offering intuitive tools for crafting and sending newsletters.

recommendedPlugins.title: MonsterInsights
recommendedPlugins.description: MonsterInsights provides a powerful Google Analytics plugin for WordPress, making it easy to connect and view website analytics directly from the dashboard.

recommendedPlugins.title: OptinMonster
recommendedPlugins.description: OptinMonster is a lead generation tool for WordPress, offering features like pop-ups, floating bars, and slide-ins to capture user information.

recommendedPlugins.title: WPForms Lite
recommendedPlugins.description: WPForms Lite is a drag-and-drop form builder for WordPress, allowing users to create contact forms, surveys, and more without any coding.

recommendedPlugins.title: YITH Product Search Extended Version
recommendedPlugins.description: An extended version of YITH's product search plugin for WooCommerce, enhancing search capabilities.

recommendedPlugins.title: YITH Product Filter Extended Version
recommendedPlugins.description: An extended version of YITH's product filter plugin for WooCommerce, enhancing product filtering capabilities.

recommendedPlugins.title: YITH Bookings Extended Version
recommendedPlugins.description: An extended version of YITH's booking plugin for WooCommerce, allowing users to book products or services.

recommendedPlugins.title: YITH Wishlist Extended Version
recommendedPlugins.description: An extended version of YITH's wishlist plugin for WooCommerce, allowing users to create and manage wishlists.
